title: Romeo and Juliet (Prokofiev)
creator_contributor_role: ITC-RAI Teatro Alla Scala, production company
subject_group: Music & Performing Arts/Ballets - Film and video adaptations
Literature/Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616 - Film and video adaptations
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television adaptations
description: Television production recorded at Palazzo dello Sport, Milan, Italy of William Shakespeare's tragedy, "Romeo and Juliet", featuring principal ballet dancers Rudolf Nureyev (Romeo), Carla Fracci (Juliet) and Margot Fonteyn (Lady Capulet). Directed by Nureyev with the cast from his La Scala, Milan production, the Corps de Ballet of Teatro Alla Scala, director Giuseppe Carbone, with music by Prokofiev played by the La Scala Orchestra conducted by Michel Sasson.
